text: @bbclaurak Do your job!  PM wants to move to final phase. PM UK to 'take it on the chin' quarter of a million deaths, plus loss of life if you are young, a child with an underlying health condition.  2mths deliberate delay-to enable lethal covid-19 spread. Yet South Korea 79 death...Why?
